benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Our benefits
benefits.description: Discover the benefits of our service

aboutTheDesigner.title: Who's behind it?
aboutTheDesigner.description: This is Andrea, the designer behind Citrus Design. With over 8 years of experience, she transforms ideas into unique and memorable experiences.

items.title: The simpler, the better
items.description: I love breaking down complex problems and, using my analytical approach, turning them into simple, clear, and meaningful design.

items.title: User-Centered Design
items.description: I like to dive deep into what people really need and how they behave, to create intuitive, useful, and meaningful experiences.

items.title: Coherent design
items.description: I use consistent patterns and components to make everything make sense and make the user experience as fluid as possible.

items.title: Constant growth
items.description: I'm always exploring new trends, tools, and approaches to keep my design fresh, relevant, and constantly evolving.

items.title: UX/UI Certified
items.description: Backed by cutting-edge and continuous training.

items.title: Recognized in Forbes
items.description: Recognized for my impact and innovation in the digital world.

items.title: Friends of Figma Leader
items.description: I drive the Figma community to revolutionize collaborative design.

items.title: ADPList Mentor
items.description: I inspire and guide the next generation of talents with passion and experience.

home.orangeMessage: Squeeze your time! With our unlimited subscription, forget about budgets and complications while adding a refreshing touch to your projects.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Discover why our clients trust us

items.text: Andrea is a professional who is easy to communicate with and quickly understands what the company is looking for, bringing new ideas and perspectives that are clearly enriching.
items.author: Joel Pascual

items.text: From the beginning, we trusted Andrea and the result has been exceptional, achieving good reviews, especially regarding the experience that the client achieves throughout the platform.
items.author: Jagoba Ormaetxea

items.text: Besides being fast and efficient, Andrea quickly understands the few inputs offered and from there her creativity emerges to reach an optimal solution.
items.author: Nacho Kleinman

howItWorks.title: This is how we work
howItWorks.description: Our process is simple and easy. Avoid meetings and squeeze your time

steps.title: Our way of working
steps.secondaryText: From subscription to final delivery, the process has been designed to maximize efficiency. Technology handles the operational, while I focus on bringing creativity and personalized attention to each project.

steps.title: Choose a plan
steps.description: Choose the subscription that best suits your needs

steps.title: Make a request
steps.description: Request your design from our portal

howItWorks.limeMessage: We use an innovative model where quality and speed are our priority. Andrea is the creative mind behind each project, we don't hire external designers.

beforeAndAfter.title: Discover the magic of change
beforeAndAfter.secondaryText: Explore fictional examples that demonstrate the impact of our process with high-quality results in no time.

howItWorks.orangeMessage: Squeeze your time! With our unlimited subscription, forget about budgets and complications while adding a refreshing touch to your projects.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best suits you. No contracts, no stress... you can cancel it at any time. Forget about freelancers or hiring an in-house designer.

items.title: Cancel anytime
items.description: No strings attached, you decide when to leave.

items.title: Try it for a week
items.description: If you're not satisfied in the first week, we'll give you your money back.

items.title: Schedule a session if you have doubts
items.description: Schedule a personalized session to resolve your questions.

products.title: Pricing model
products.secondaryText: Choose from one of our monthly subscriptions. Start right away without a contract - pause and cancel it at any time.

pricing.customPriceDescription: For companies that require much more powerful designs, we have what you need.

infoBox.title: Still have more questions?
infoBox.description: Get in touch with us, we'll be happy to answer all your questions :)

items.title: How can I make design requests?
items.answer: Once you subscribe to one of our plans, there's a section called Requests in your profile where you can submit your requests. Remember that you can only have one active at a time until the current request is closed.

items.title: When will I receive the designs?
items.answer: It depends on the complexity of the request, normally you'll receive the designs within 2-3 business days.

items.title: Can I change my plan later?
items.answer: Yes, you just need to unsubscribe, wait until the end of your current subscription and subscribe again to the plan you choose.

items.title: How does billing work?
items.answer: On the first day of execution of the first subscription and in monthly renewal cycles, you can download the invoice from the Billing tab within the private client area.

items.title: Is there a refund policy if I don't like the service?
items.answer: You can try one of our subscriptions for a week and if you're not satisfied with the service, we'll give you your money back.

contact.title: How can we help you?
contact.description: Choose how you prefer to contact us and we'll answer any questions you may have, or if you prefer, book an introductory 20-minute call.

email.title: Send us an email
email.description: Have questions or need more information? Write to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

chat.title: Chat with us
chat.description: Prefer something faster? Connect with us on chat and we'll resolve your doubts right away.

meeting.title: Book a 1:1
meeting.description: Let's talk about your project. Schedule a personalized session and find the best solution for your design.

waitlist.title: Join the waitlist
waitlist.description: We want to provide the best service to everyone, so we don't take many subscriptions at once. Join our waitlist and we'll notify you when a spot becomes available on our platform 🎉
waitlist.successDescription: You'll soon receive a confirmation email with your current position. If a spot becomes available, we'll notify you by email and you'll have X days to complete your subscription. If you don't do so within that period, your spot will pass to the next user.

company.title: Citrus Designer
company.description: We transform your ideas into exceptional designs. Simple and effective design subscription service.

projects.title: Some of our favorite projects

items.title: Gureik
items.description: Design of the delivery website for the multi-brand restaurant chain.
